author: Mat Smith
title: The Morning After: Samsung pays tribute to its flip phone past with limited-edition foldable
description: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy Z Flip 5 Retro, a limited-edition foldable that pays homage to the SGH-E700 (AKA the SGH-E715 in the US), which came out 20 years ago in 2003. It has the same indigo blue and silver color combo as the original and a few special…
